# Next.js Celiac Disease Poster Project

## Project Overview
One-page poster web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui to showcase the celiac disease problem in France.

## Tech Stack
- Next.js 15 with App Router
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- shadcn/ui components
- React 19

## Project Structure
- `/app` - Next.js app router pages
- `/components` - React components including poster sections
- `/lib` - Utility functions
- `/public` - Static assets

## Development Notes
- Focus on clean, readable code
- Use Tailwind for styling
- Ensure responsive design for different screen sizes
- Optimize for print if needed
